channel.title: CVE Feed for payloadcms -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-30843|2024-08-02T14:37:15.432Z -- payloadcms -- payload
item.description: Payload is a free and open source headless content management system. In versions prior to 1.7.0, if a user has access to documents that contain hidden fields or fields they do not have access to, the user could reverse-engineer those values via brute force. Version 1.7.0 contains a patch. As a workaround, write a `beforeOperation` hook to remove `where` queries that attempt to access hidden field data.
